question: Which of the following product of Madhya Pradesh do not has a geographical Indication status?
option2: Bell Metal Ware of Datia and Tikamgarh
explanation: At present only five products of M.P are under GI status Bagh Prints of Madhya Pradesh Leather Toys of Indore Chanderi Fabric Bell Metal Ware of Datia and Tikamgarh Maheshwar Sarees & Fabrics
